Question: In 1883, the City Hotel in Sunbury, Pennsylvania was the first building to be lit with this person's three-wire system.
Hints: On February 24, 1886, at the age of thirty-nine, this person married the 20-year-old Mina Miller (1866–1947) in Akron, Ohio.
This person has appeared in popular culture as a character in novels, films, comics and video games.
In 1885, this person bought property in Fort Myers, Florida, and built what was later called Seminole Lodge as a winter retreat.
